Using Scattertext to Compare the Mueller Report to the Starr Report

By Jason Kessler, @jasonkessler

  • The Github repo which contains the source code (and data) used to create this analysis.
  • Each point corresopnd to a word used in either analysis.
  • The higher a point is, the more it was used in the Mueller report, and the futher to the right, the more it was used in the Starr report.
  • Points are bluer if they are more associated with the Mueller report, more red if they are more associated with the star report, and yellow if they were used with about the same frequency.
  • Click on words or points to see their use in context.
